bio: Uh, hi! I'm g8 . Planet Ruler ðŸ˜¸. I want to live in a world where people believe that one day cats will rule this planet. When my owner isn't watching, I steal their brooches and use them for litter paper. I'm not sorry. We're so fur-tunate to have found each other!
